description: crater-like rock formation in foreground center; truck with white topper at top center
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Signed; on back of mount, in pencil: [To Harry - / With thanks for helping / make it all possible - / Michael & Paula / December 2002]
signed: LLC on mount below image, in pencil: [1993]; LRC on mount below image, in pencil: [Michael A. Smith]; on back of mount, in pencil: [9306-06/24 #17 / OUR TRUCK ON THE WHITE RIM TRAIL / CANYONLANDS, UTAH, 1993]
title: Our Truck on the White Rim Trail, Canyonlands, Utah
